CareBarrier.name: CareBarrier
CareBarrier.description: Represents the circumstances or obstacles affecting a patient or member.

CareBarrierTypeId.description: Identifier for the care barrier type for the patient or member.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date on which the barrier becomes effective.

ExtlProblemDefIdentifier.description: The ID of the external problem definition in the source system.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this barrier is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PatientId.description: Identifier for the patient or member.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the care barrier record in the external source system.

SourceSystemModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the care barrier record was last modified in the external source system.

SourceSystemName.description: The name of the external source system from which the record was imported.

SurveyResponseId.description: Identifier for the survey response related to the barrier.
